まだ知らないコト照らして\r\n: Illuminating things I haven't discovered yet
ねえ、教えて あの花は\r\n: Hey, tell me about that flower
なぜ上に咲くのかしら？\r\n: I wonder why it grows so tall?
きっと空とお話をするためでしょう！\r\n: It must be so they can talk to the sky!
風と舞う虫達は\r\n: The bugs twirling with the wind
なぜ光に集まるの？\r\n: Why do they gather around the light?
それは明るいステージで「ワン・ツー！」\r\n: Because that's their bright stage 「One, two!」
不思議と出会うたび心ときめく\r\n: Every time I encounter something wonderful on my journey, my heart flutters
悲しみも喜びも巻き込んで\r\n: Sadness and happiness are both intertwined
ステキをお届けです！\r\n: And something amazing is delivered right to you!
おひさまみたいなパワー届けたいの\r\n: I want share my powerful light to you like the sun
私だけの輝き探して…\r\n: I'm searching for my own unique sparkle...
いつか小さなつぼみ 開く時はあなたと一緒に\r\n: Someday when my little bud blooms someday, you'll be by my side
笑顔 どんな時も最高に！\r\n: No matter when, my smile will be the brightest!
